snippet: The streaming music service hopes to keep users on its site longer, and sell more ads, by offering playlists of short video clips.
abstract: Spotify is engaged in talks with array of media companies to bring short video clips to its music streaming service; change is aimed at holding listener attention for longer periods of time, increasing ad revenue.

byline.original: By BEN SISARIO and EMILY STEEL

lead_paragraph: The streaming music service hopes to keep users on its site longer, and sell more ads, by offering playlists of short video clips.

headline.main: Spotify Seeking Video Deals With Media Companies
headline.print_headline: To Keep Users Engaged, Spotify Is Seeking Video Deals With Media Companies
